metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000190 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
SimpleXML (latest version 2.7.1) is vulnerable to an XXE vulnerability resulting SSRF, information disclosure, DoS and so on.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-1000190` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsimple-xml-java - 2.7.1-3
No subscription required

notes.Note: msalvatore> As of 11/09/2018, there is a comment on github recommending updating to "2.7.3". This may be the fix version.

criterions.comment: simple-xml package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.1-3').
